fullText: Mr. Obeidallah's likability and the universality of his concerns make 'The New One' an engaging if not always polished evening of storytelling about the difficulties of raising children in an age of identity politics.
dtliExcerpt: Mr. Obeidallah's likability and the universality of his concerns make 'The New One' an engaging if not always polished evening of storytelling about the difficulties of raising children in an age of identity politics.
